title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, copy, delete models via simple async/sync API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, chat and embedding wrappers with standard LangChain interface.

title: llama-index-integrations/llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM implementation for Ollama; plug local models into RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI): markdown, code highlighting, model manager, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; sync/async APIs, Spring Boot starter available.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama with WebUI, LiteLLM proxy, Postgres, etc.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop frontend for Ollama; cross-platform, < 5 MB binary.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama chat completions admin interface and REST endpoint.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama with Faraday backend and Railtie for Rails apps.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client generated from Ollama OpenAPI spec; supports context cancellation and retries.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models as conversational bots with file upload RAG.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript bindings for the Ollama local LLM server.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package on PyPI for interacting with Ollama’s REST API.
